remarks: Define the class of orthomodular lattices.  Definition from [Kalmbach] p. 16.  (Contributed by NM, 18-Sep-2011.)
statement:
df-oml $p |- OML = { l e. OL | A. a e. ( Base ` l ) A. b e. ( Base ` l ) ( a ( le ` l ) b -> b = ( a ( join ` l ) ( b ( meet ` l ) ( ( oc ` l ) ` a ) ) ) ) } $.
$d a b l $.
